Package ec.co.ant

package ec.co.ant
Ant Colony Optimization algorithms This package contains the components necessary to implement ACO algorithms, specifically the classic pair: Ant System and Ant Colony System. The central object in this package is AntSpecies, which coordinates most of the other components. Have a look at the the ec.app.tsp and ec.app.knapsack example apps to get a sense of how these components can be used in practice.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    ec.co
    The ec.co package contains combinatorial optimization (CO) algorithms and the components necessary to build them.
    ec.co.grasp
     
  • Class
    Description
    ACSLocalUpdateRule
    A "local" pheromone decay rule in the style of Ant Colony System.
    AntSpecies
    Coordinates the core behavior of Ant Colony Optimization algorithms.
    AntSystemUpdateRule
    ANT_CYCLE, ANT_DENSITY, and ANT_QUANTITY pheromone update rules, in the style of the Ant System algorithm.
    AntSystemUpdateRule.DepositRule
     
    ComponentSelector
    A basic strategy for selecting a Component out of a list of candidates.
    ConstructionRule
    Defines a rule for constructing ants based on pheromone values.
    GlobalUpdateRule
    A "global" pheromone update rule in the style of Ant Colony System.
    GlobalUpdateRule.BestStrategy
     
    GreedyComponentSelector
    A trivial rule that builds solutions greedily to have the highest heuristic value in the neighborhood.
    PheromoneTable
    A data structure that maintains the pheromone values for different components.
    ProportionateComponentSelector
    Provides a function that chooses a Component stochastically in the style of Ant System.
    PseudorandomProportionateComponentSelector
    The classic ant transition rule used by Ant Colony System.
    SimpleConstructionRule
    Builds an individual by adding one component at a time.
    SimplePheromoneTable
    A straightforward table that stores and retrieves pheromone concentrations (doubles) independently for a number of components.
    UpdateRule
    Defines a rule for updating pheromone values using a list of "ants."
